titles.title: CB 204 For I'm Building a People of Power

properties.copyright: ©1977 Thankyou Music (EMI Chrsitian Music Publ., Inc.)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
FOR I’M BUILDING A PEOPLE OF POWER,
And I’m making a people of praise.
Who will move through this land by My Spirit,
And will glorify My Holy name.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Build the church, Lord,
Make it strong, Lord,
Bind our hearts, Lord,
In Your love.
We are one, Lord,
In Your body,
In the Kingdom of Your Son.
